activities: BellTower Technologies mass notification service customers may provide contact information for their employees or customers. This information is securely stored by BellTower and is accessible to the customer via secure web interface.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: customer contact data, customer provided contact data for customer's business locations and individuals at those locations, contact data collected through website forms and phone recordings as part of the notification services. Data is sometimes manually processed for formatting.
